title: Layoffs, Hiring Freeze Spread Through Tech — The Information - The Information
content: Layoffs, Hiring Freeze Spread Through Tech — The Information  The Information
description: Things really are turning brutal for tech workers. We scooped the news today that Cameo laid off a quarter of its workforce, just the latest example of the layoffs spreading through tech. Also today, Business Insider reported that Meta Platforms has instituted a hiring freeze through the end of ...
